testcase.classname: In order to test Home Page of application
testcase.name: Existing User is Edited
testcase.system-out: Given Enter URL "https://s1.demo.opensourcecms.com/wordpress/wp-login.php"..passed When Enter username "opensourcecms" and password "opensourcecms"............passed And Click on login button...................................................passed Then User must successfully login to the application........................passed When On user list and select user to edit...................................passed And Click on edit user......................................................passed Then User edited and updated successfully...................................passed
